Test::File::ShareDir::Dist(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation Test::File::ShareDir::Dist(3)

NAME

Test::File::ShareDir::Dist - Simplified dist oriented ShareDir tester

VERSION

version 1.001002

SYNOPSIS

    use Test::File::ShareDir::Dist {
        '-root' => 'some/root/path',
        'Dist-Zilla-Plugin-Foo' => 'share/DZPF',
    };

"-root" is optional, and defaults to "cwd"

NOTE: There's a bug prior to 5.18 with "use Foo { -key => }", so for backwards compatibility, make sure you either quote the key: "use Foo { '-key' => }", or make it the non-first key.
